Sentencas: A key to the development of metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells (MSCs) is the manufacturing of gastight thin-film electrolytes, which separate the cathode from the anode.
Titulo: Multi-layer thin-film electrolytes for metal supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This paper focuses the electrolyte manufacturing on the basis of 8YSZ (8 mol.-% Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2).
Titulo: Multi-layer thin-film electrolytes for metal supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrolyte layers are applied by a physical vapor deposition (PVD) gas flow sputtering (GFS) process.
Titulo: Multi-layer thin-film electrolytes for metal supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The gas-tightness of the electrolyte is significantly improved when sequential oxidic and metallic thin-film multi-layers are deposited, which interrupt the columnar grain structure of single-layer electrolytes.
Titulo: Multi-layer thin-film electrolytes for metal supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Such electrolytes with two or eight oxide/metal layers and a total thickness of about 4 mu m obtain leakage rates of less than 3 x 10(-4) hPa dm(3) s(-1) cm(-2) (Delta p: 100 hPa) at room temperature and therefore fulfill the gas tightness requirements.
Titulo: Multi-layer thin-film electrolytes for metal supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: They are also highly tolerant with respect to surface flaws and particulate impurities which can be present on the graded anode underground.
Titulo: Multi-layer thin-film electrolytes for metal supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: MSC cell tests with double-layer and multilayer electrolytes feature high power densities more than 1.4 W cm(-2) at 850 degrees C and underline the high potential of MSC cells.
Titulo: Multi-layer thin-film electrolytes for metal supported solid oxide fuel cells
